details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-2:202x - 8.4.5 Fonts - 8.4.5.8 Unicode character maps - Valid Unicode values
details.description: If a ToUnicode CMap is present, the Unicode values it specifies shall all be greater than zero (0), but not equal to either U+FEFF or U+FFFE

rule.description: If a ToUnicode CMap is present, the Unicode values it specifies shall all be greater than zero (0), but not equal to either U+FEFF or U+FFFE

error.message: The glyph has an invalid Unicode value, which is either 0, or is equal to U+FEFF or U+FFFE
